products_data.Detail description: Tops in soft organic cotton jersey with a decorative scalloped trim around the neckline, a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and short puff sleeves with a decorative scalloped trim.

Set with two bodysuits, two pairs of leggings, a romper suit and a scarf in soft cotton jersey. Bodysuits with short sleeves and press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch. Leggings with an elasticated waist. Romper suit with long sleeves, front pockets and press-studs down the front and along one leg. Scarf with press-studs at the back of the neck.

outfit_descriptions: A stylish and comfortable set consisting of a light pink 3P SS T-shirt with a decorative scalloped trim around the neckline, paired with white leggings and a matching scarf. The perfect combination of elegance and comfort for a summer evening stroll or a casual day out.

A chic and versatile multiset featuring a grey basic romper suit with long sleeves, front pockets, and press-studs down the front and along one leg, teamed with a pair of dusty light grey leggings and a soft pink scarf. Perfect for a busy summer day with plenty of activities planned.

An adorable and practical ensemble comprising a light grey basic bodysuit with short sleeves and press-studs on one shoulder, paired with a pair of white leggings and a matching scarf. Ideal for a summer playdate or a family outing to the park.
